title: just starting - a1
text: I can say “hello” and introduce myself… but full sentences? Naah

title: beginner - a2
text: I can order food, ask for directions, and maybe survive a trip abroad

title: intermediate
text: I can chat with locals and book a hotel without awkward silences

title: upper intermediate
text: I can hold a conversation about work, hobbies, and life… with only a few “uhhh” moments

title: advanced
text: I chat easily about deep topics, crack jokes, and even binge-watch TV shows without subtitles!
